Dear Mr. Clark:
We have checked our files and find that we do not have copies
of the following ghetto project materials:
April 12 - First Report—Programming for the Disadvantaged
(Addressed to Vice President Humphrey).
June 13 - Third Report on Programming for the Disadvantaged,
also Notes on April 21 ETS Meeting in New York City.
We would appreciate receiving copies of these reports for our
fi1es.
Secretary to Mr. Cox
